blocks.title: Uc Need Validate 4 blocked
blocks.message: Step blocked: Exploratory validation blocked: Insufficient evidence to validate the requirement regarding loyalty access.

items.label: Error
items.value: Exploratory validation blocked: Insufficient evidence to validate the requirement regarding loyalty access.

items.label: Assessment
items.value: The exploratory step requires validation that loyalty customers receive earlier access (30 days vs 7 days). However, the evidence does not provide direct confirmation of this behavior, as it only references the linked use case without any concrete API reads or persisted state checks to substantiate the claim. Therefore, the validation is inconclusive due to a lack of specific evidence supporting the requirement.
